Name: Put Your Brain On
About the game: We bring you the ideal solution to combine the useful with the pleasant. Put yor Brain On it`s a game about thinking...in which you are a farmer and you have to plant the harvest before the sun go down. Hurry up ! Don't forget to plant in such a way that no ground remains empty! Game features : - Challenges based on intuition and logic - More than 50 levels - A lot of fun as a farm owner - Each level has a deadline
